name: Dodge
description: Dodge is a minimalist arcade-style game originally made for Ludum Dare 26. Your aim is simple: To dodge the incoming squares for as long as possible.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 8.1 Processor: Potato Memory: 30 MB RAM Storage: 6 MB available space

reviews.review_text: A fun and difficult game. Not an extremely large amount of content but good replay value and a good challenge.
Mediocre game while it worked. But now I can't even start it no matter what I do.  2/10
♛ Good Game to get free 'Traiding Cards'. ♛
Just a really simple game where you have to dodge incoming cubes and lines. Nothing too special to recommend.
